According to local people, the situation of

In just a few days, people's houses have been swept into the sea and the sea has grown deep,
almost to the edge.  The loss of a person's house is

Nhu households have been relocated by the government. But there are still
11 households that are not willing to live there.
We, the people, have to pay for it

caused the coast of Cam An ward to miss more than

successfully coordinated to rescue 10 Quang

while ashore to avoid the wind, ran

prepared for the harvest-praying ritual, also
known as nh que ritual. This is a
unique cultural and religious activity with
unique features and is one of the
major festivals kept during the year
by the people.  Here, the
Co Mua Festival is held in early October every
year with the meaning of praying for favorable weather and
good harvests, bringing prosperity to the family. The
ceremony is held outdoors on
a large, dry land in the village in a
ritual that always includes  The custom of Sacrificing to give thanks for
gold: In years with a good harvest, for a big ceremony, the
sacrifice is made with a smaller buffalo, then using a
goat or chicken. After the sacrificial rituals, every
villager will go to each part of
their fields and gardens to pray for a good harvest.  autumn, but most especially
in this new year,
dream of good luck and harmony to be a rice plant.
Chac hoi and you will have a
full life. The harvest festival is a spiritual bridge
between heaven and earth and people are maintained.
Maintaining through many generations the ritual rituals or the
dances and songs during the festival
are unique cultural values ​​worth

minds of the people here
related to the incident of the escaped crocodile.  Going
out to the An Hoa Cultural Park lake in
Rach Gia city, Kien Giang province, on the afternoon of
October 16, the provincial forest ranger department
said it would continue to catch crocodiles
by releasing ducks as bait.
Determined
that four out of eight escaped crocodiles
were found, the force
cleared the grass and released 10 animals
around the park lake. As bait, the
remaining four crocodiles will be electrocuted when they eat the prey.
Recently, An Hoa Cultural Park raised 44 crocodiles to
serve visitors due to the impact of the
covid-19 epidemic, but the unit did
not have the funds to repair them until
October 11. Committee  People of
Rach Gia City announce to lure
escaped crocodiles out of the lake of the
above mentioned An Hoa cultural park until 3:00
p.m. October 12. Kien Giang Provincial Forest Protection Department
coordinates with
related departments.  The officer pumped water to drain the lake and
counted 38/44 crocodiles, meaning there were six
escaped individuals. Based on that, plus
two crocodiles that staff caught on
October 10, the unit confirmed that in the
past time there were  A total of eight crocodiles
escaped into the park lake, each
weighing from 10 to 25

Amazon River has dropped to a record low level, and the
Han Dynasty in the Amazon region has claimed

This is not

and medical care for

million residents in the river basins.  The Amazon
is lacking in medical care.
We must mobilize national resources
and the government must also send medical teams
to the source communities.

2010, the Sydney Opera House in
Australia
will be 50 years old on October 20, 2023. This is one of the
iconic works of the
country and is  The
most popular tourist attraction in the
world, the Sydney Opera House, also known as the
Con So Theater, was
designed by Danish architect John. The project was
started on October 2, 1959 and
took 14 years to build.  The initial cost of the new construction was
only 7 million Australian dollars,
but in the end it cost up to 104
million dollars due to technical difficulties
related to the clamshell machine as well as
costs increasing many times over.
October 20, 1973 British Queen Elizabeth
II cut the ribbon to
inaugurate the theater with the attendance of more than 1
million people at Sydney Harbor. The
Sydney Theater was recognized by Unesco as a
world cultural heritage on October 20, 1973.  June 28,
2007 Many events and
world-class performances are also being held
both inside and outside the
theater. Two items from the movie Wizard of
OS and many other items are being auctioned in
New York.  Previously, the auction house held an
exhibition for fans.

the actor who played the role of a straw man in the film
Phu Thuy Xu OZ is being auctioned at
Lion H autographs.  Scores
of two classic pieces of music, Over the
Rainbow and If I only had a Brain, only
a few copies of the two scores are
displayed in public places such as Yell
University, Library of Congress,

these two scores are really rare. It is estimated that the

A man died under a highway viaduct,
ladies and gentlemen, this afternoon, Binh
Duong Provincial Police Departments are
coordinating with Thuan An City Police to
investigate and clarify the discovery of a
human skeleton in an
empty lot.  Earlier that day, at noon, some
people were walking in an empty lot
on Thuan Giao Street, 28 Thuan
Giao Ward, when they discovered a human skeleton. The
police were reported to be present. The
scene was sealed and examined, noting that the
scene was a plot of land.  Located in an alley
at the end of Thuan Giao 28 street, it was formerly
an abandoned Go Ma area, so the trees were
dense enough for people to pass by. However, the
skeleton did not have a head. After the
search process, the police discovered a part of the body.
skull nearby, through some remaining items,
it was determined that the victim may be
male and the cause of death is unknown. The
case is currently being investigated at
about 8 o'clock this morning. This morning, people
discovered the man had died.  death on Road
963 under the viaduct of
Ho Chi Minh City Long Thanh Dau Expressway, section
through Phu Huu Ward, Thu Duc City,
Ho Chi Minh City Police and
competent forces examine the scene
and investigate the case.
During the autopsy, the
authorities discovered a body with
scratches. They expanded the scene investigation in the
opposite village and discovered a
driverless car parked on the
highway, a source said.  Initially, the
authorities determined that the killing was not a
traffic accident. According to
this source, the man stopped his car
on the highway to go to the bathroom, then a
group of thieves came to steal property from the car
and was arrested.  The man discovered that this group was running
away. The victim chased him and fell to his
death on the afternoon of October 17 on Highway
1A, passing through Ward 10, My Tho City.
Tien Giang had a traffic accident

Tien Giang province coordinated with ward
10 police to regulate traffic and investigate the
cause of the
accident. This morning, three  Five young men traveling

today.
